text: “Læa phwk than xya nang nı thukhn thang doy thakar khu læa skad kan hı xxk cak thang khx ngxallxh phu sung sraththa tx phraxngkh læa phwk than yang prarthna hı thang khx ngxallxhkht læa cng raluk thung khna thi phwk than mi canwn nxy læw phraxngkh di thrng hı phwk than mi canwn mak khun læa phwk than cng dutheid wa phl sudthay khxng brrda phu kx khwam seiyhay nan pen xyangri?”
